content: Study the white man and learn of his rich and mysterious culture by reading the “Stuff White People Like” book. The book will provide you detailed information on things white people like such as: sandwiches, leashes on children, hazing <del>and slavery</del>.

Redefine what it means to live on the edge when you take the helm of the motorized drifting tricycle. This ain’t no schoolyard trike – the motorized tricycle is designed for extreme riding action that’ll turn any empty parking lot into your personal playground.

Get serious about your war with bacteria by using the nuclear element soap bars. Whether you decide on uranium or plutonium, each element soap bar features a refreshing smell and totally normal nuclear glow that lets you know it’s really working.

Paint a masterpiece on your belly while you grow a masterpiece in your belly with this pregnancy painting kit. The kit is completely safe for use and includes everything you’ll need to unleash your imagination and make your pregnant glow even stronger.

titleEN: Back To The Future License Plate
content: Every bastard on the road will want to prove to you that they can do 90 while your car is rocking this replica Back To The Future license plate. Now any fan of this classic movie can enjoy owning the clever “OUTATIME” that the Doc had on his DeLorean time machine.

Freak out your friends and family who are deadly afraid of insects with the remote control centipede. Once they see this nearly 16″ long multicolored insect crawling steadily their way they’re sure to scream in terror as you maniacally laugh til your heart’s content.

Save your phone from a watery death by making sure it stays protected with the waterproof iPhone case. This battle tested case allows you to accessorize all of your phone’s features while making it waterproof for up to an impressive ten feet.

titleEN: Monsters Glow In The Dark Decals
content: Give your children permanent insomnia after you fill up their room with the monsters glow in the dark decals. Each decal features a small and wide-eyed monster that glows bright and can be safely removed from the walls when your children start having panic attacks.

Give your keys a whimsical edge with the unicorn key cover. This novelty cover  turns your dull house keys into your own tiny pet unicorn, complete with a colorful mane and jewel-toned eyes so captivating you’ll never forget where you last left your keys.

In the age of wireless everything, bring a touch of old school style to your life with the cheeseburger phone. Made with a juicy bun, melty cheese, and golden sesame seed buns, it’s the only phone you’ll ever want to use. And yes, it’s the same one from the movie Juno.

Give your festive party a spooky and colorful vibe with these skull string lights. Each light is individually shaped like small colored skulls that glow in every color under the rainbow, providing a captivating lighting effect that is sure keep the party raging all night.

Take your first person point of view movies to the next level by using the GoPro extension pole while filming. The 26″ pole sports a transparent design that’s extremely lightweight and sturdy so you can capture mind-blowing shots in almost any type of environment.

Journey to some of Westeros’s most iconic locations without leaving the comfort of home with the Game of Thrones pop-up book. With vivid and detailed 3D illustrations, each page makes landmarks like the castle of Winterfell come to life.

How much do you hate yourself? Finding meaning in Pollock’s paintings is easier than putting together one of his jigsaw puzzles. The sense of accomplishment upon completion will be short lived after you realize you could’ve just thrown paint on blank puzzle pieces.

Don’t let its size fool you, the nano remote control quadrocopter provides big time fun without breaking the bank. LED lights at each end help you identify the front and back while its small size makes the nano quadrocopter ideal for indoor use.

Don’t forget to bring a towel when you venture off to the beach or pool. With Towlie by your side you’ll always have a friend close by in case you need to dry yourself off, stay warm, or just make terrible life decisions with – Towlie’s your man.

Make sure your champion secures victory against his opponents with the League of Legends weapon set. The set displays every deadly and impressive looking piece of weaponry your violent little heart could every desire for battle.

Keep your pooch warm and cozy while boosting his street cred with the dog hoodie. The hoodie is available for purchase in all colors and sizes so you can find the right one to suit your dog’s needs. No matter where you walk him to, he’ll look like the realest pet in the game.

Protect your drink from sinking to its watery grave with the inflatable drink floatie. People aren’t the only ones that require a life guard on duty – and with a floatie snuggly wrapped snugly around your drink, you can practice responsible drinking while on the water.

Let freedom ring as your soar the skies with the remote control flying bald eagle. This resplendent eagle has a massive 9-1/2′ wingspan which allows it to properly catch the wind and perform some majestic as fuck aerial movements.

Transform your extremities into that of a flexible creature of the sea with the finger tentacles. Each tentacle fits snugly over each finger and makes it appear as if you’ve got four seven inch long rubbery tentacles chock-full of suction cups along the bottom.

“One ring to rule them all, one ring to find them, one ring to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them.” Fresh off the forge of Mount Doom, this precious ring of power can now be all yours to gaze and awe at it while you descend into CGI generated madness.

Illuminate your path along the asphalt by equipping your deck with the underglow skateboard lights. These easy to install lights require absolutely no screws and come in a variety of hues so you can create amazing effects while shredding through the streets.

If you’re all about flash and pizzazz, nothing will work better than accessorizing your outfit with light up apparel. Whether it’s sunglasses, bow ties, or even bras – the light up apparel will get you noticed wherever the wild and spontaneous night takes you.

Power up all your electronic devices while on the road with the powerline coffee cup in your daily driver. Styled to look like a standard coffee cup, it fits perfectly into cup holders and provides a 120V outlet so you can power everything from a laptop to microwave.

Add to your every expanding galaxy of collectibles with the LEGO Star Wars Sandcrawler. Straight from the deserts of Tatooine, this geeky LEGO set includes everything you need to recreate your favorite scenes – including LEGO Jawas and droids.

Mesmerize everyone around you with this simple yet intriguing kinetic spring toy. Part kinetic sculpture and part toy, the kinetic spring is capable of providing hours upon hours of entertainment, and comes with a small pouch so you can take it anywhere.

Turn your pool into a watery arena where you can showcase your skill and valor with the jousting inflatable wooden logs. Each aquatic gladiator gets their own inflatable log to float on and log boppers to knock their opponent down into their watery grave.

Now with the reusable rubber food savers you’ll be able to keep those delicious leftovers fresh even if they’re too big to fit into plastic containers. Each food saver stretches to fit snugly over a variety of food so you can keep them fresh longer.

Get those Popeye-like forearms you’ve always wanted when you begin working out with the grip strength builder wraps. The grips double the width of lifting bars, allowing you to maximize your workouts so that you see gains in record time.

Capture the senses while you provide your home with some unique ambient lighting with the sound light dome. After installing the sound light dome in your home, it will respond to sound with hues that relate to the pitch of the sound – making it perfect for parties.

Bring military precision to operation “Enduring Offspring” with the military diaper backpack. Decked out in full digital camouflage, the diaper bag maximizes space so you can carry around everything you need in a backpack befitting of your high ranking position.

Thanks to the innovative design of the wine glass for big noses, you’ll finally be able to fit that giant schnoz of yours into the wine glass for once. The unique stemware features a hand forged notch rim to facilitate drinking and enhance the wine smelling experience.

Make the most out of the precious time you have on this earth with your children by traumatizing them for life with this easy to follow instructional book. It utilizes 7 proven methods that apply to all parenting styles so kids everywhere can be forever scarred.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Galaxy Shoelaces
content: Show off your love of astronomy while catching the attention of others with the glow in the dark galaxy shoelaces. These strapping shoelaces glow brighter than a supernova once they’ve spent some time in the light, so they can be seen in the blackest of holes.

Push yourself to the limit like the man of steel when you workout with the Superman compression shirt. The shirt will motivate you to workout with such intensity you just might be able to leap tall building in a single bound <del>while looking like a attention whore gym asshole</del>.

Your old childhood putty toy is back and better than ever. Upon cracking open the rainbow putty balls you’ll unleash a gooey, sticky, bouncy, and multicolored blob capable of providing hours of entertainment that your own kids will brush off while playing on their iPad.

Upgrade the imposing stature of your high end status symbol automobile with the Mercedes Benz illuminated star. This eye catching emblem is custom made to set your Benz apart from the rest – so there’s no confusion regarding how much better you are than everyone else.

No matter how grave or gruesome the ouchie, the crime scene bandages will help keep unwanted bacteria away from the wound. Though something terrible has taken place, tell those nasty germs to move it along, there’s nothing to see here.

Fight off rain clouds and thunderstorms with gusto with the sword handle umbrella at your side. You’ll be able to parry the worst mother nature throws your way with a spacious 41″ canopy that comes with a convenient shoulder strap so you can take it wherever you go.

Bring a little beauty of the outdoors into your home with the pine cone lamp. The bold pine cone shape of the light fixture not only makes it a great accent piece for any room, but it keeps the lamp from shining down on reflective surfaces while providing ample light.

Get your morning fix by ingesting a full dose of caffeine with the prescription bottle coffee mug. For those of us who need a nice hot cup of joe to get the day started, this the comical coffee mug is the ideal way to kickstart things in the morning with some legal stimulants.

Smell like obesity with the newest line of cologne from Demeter – the pizza cologne. This intoxicating fragrance will leave you smelling like a greasy, artery-clogging, freshly sliced piece of pizza that just came out of the oven. Garlic stick cologne sold separately.

Swim as graceful as a mythical half-human sea creature the next time you go into the beach wearing mermaid tail fins. The fins are joined together in order to mimic the anatomy of a mermaid fin, allowing you to swim faster and more efficiently underwater.

Hulk smash the boogie man with this destructive Hulk fist nightlight. The nightlight emits a soft green glow from a first shaped lamp that creates the illusion the Hulk has busted through your concrete wall like an angry version of the Kool-Aid man.

Tear through the streets of your hilly neighborhood like a true adrenaline junkie with the urban shredder. The vehicle keeps the rider low to the ground for extreme handling and stability while also featuring an intuitive hand braking and acceleration system.

Accessorize your car to strike fear into your fellow drivers with the skull tire valve caps. These fearsome valve caps come shaped like tiny Terminator-like skulls with burning, soul-sucking red eyes and feature a Buna N O-Ring to provide a perfect seal.

Help yourself stay focused on the present with the past present future watch. This clever watch’s quirky face helps you take a greater appreciation of the ‘now’ by only displaying the current time through a small open window located at the top center of the watch.

Turn any location into your very own private cinema with the HDMI pocket projector. This compact and lightweight projector is capable of projecting clear images onto any smooth surface and is compatible with most smartphones via a USB cable.

Give your poker nights a wild west feel to it by playing with the vintage playing cards. Each card in this unique deck is distressed in order to achieve a vintage look that’ll make everyone think you picked them up at the general store in the year 1870.

Bring the park to your backyard with this fun and functional sandbox bench. Rather than forcing your kids to sit in the sand, it provides two wooden benches in addition to a nice overhead cover to protect from the sun on those hot summer days.

After helping all the obese people off their floaties, Wall-E and Eve are here to help with your morning coffee. The Wall-E and Eve mug set are the novelty ceramic mugs designed to look like miniature versions of the most lovable robots you’ve ever met.

Keep your hands from smelling like servitude after dealing with smelly ingredients by using the odor removing bar. Simply rub the re-usable bar over your bare hands after working with odorous foods such as garlic and onions to properly eliminate the smell.

Fulfill your child’s dreams of becoming a brave firefighter with the firefighter bed set. Once your ambitious offspring is tucked in, the realistic fireman uniform emblazoned on the comforter and pillow case transforms him/her into a heroic firefighter.

Turn regular traffic violation stops into full on arrests with the realistic gun shift knob in your vehicle. This revolver-styled knob includes step by step instructions for installation and is designed to work on both automatic and manual transmission vehicles.

Light up the streets and stand out from the crowd with the programmable wheel spoke lights. These custom spoke lights equip your bike with 32 LEDs you can program into your own personal multicolored light show that’ll turn heads everywhere you pedal to.

This isn’t your Grandpa’s hearing aid – this super ear amplifier kit boosts audio by 5000%! Listen in to corporate meetings to gather inside information, or pioneer a new form of suicide by wearing it at a concert. The applications for the super hearing aid are endless!

Organize a quick game of table tennis wherever you go with the portable ping pong set. Apart from making the office a more bearable place to be, the set includes everything you need to evade boredom by turning any room with a table into your own personal game room.

Increase the cuteness factor of any drink you whip up with the Hello Kitty ice cube tray. This eco-friendly silicone tray makes eight adorable Hello Kitty shaped ice cubes per batch – making them great for all kinds of events like parties and sleepovers.

Add a geeky touch of style to any room with the abyss table lamp. The Italian made lamp features a bold modular structure that allows you to bend and fold the 43″ lamp into whatever abstract masterpiece you find aesthetically pleasing for that given day.

Keep your water balloon general infantry properly supplied with help from the water balloon factory. Once attached to the garden hose, this useful add-on allows you to quickly fill up water balloons as fast as you can throw them – giving you the upper hand in battle.

Honk, honk! Push that old ice cream truck aside and make way for the taco truck tray. This novelty taco plate allows you to keep two extra hard shell tacos on reserve, so you can binge eat your delicious meal without ever taking a single break.

Transform the ceiling of your plain old room into a breathtaking starry night with the glow in the dark stars. The stars stick to almost any wall or ceiling without the use of glue and shine bright to provide a one of a kind ambient lighting only unspoiled Mother Nature can top.

Dress up like your favorite paraphsychologist whenever it gets cold outside with the Ghostbusters Venkman jacket. Styled to look just like Venkman’s iconic ghostbusting uniform, the jacket will keep you looking stylish during the winter months.

Keep your furry family member safe while on the road by placing them in the automobile dog safety harness. This specially designed harness acts as a sort of child car seat but for your pet, ensuring that your small dog will travel comfortably while strapped up for safety.

Collect and share your captured memories the old fashioned way with the instant print camera. Providing a nostalgic touch to any photograph, this 86 mm x 108 mm film size instant camera is perfect for old school photographers looking to snap the perfect shot.

Relive the glorious golden years of your youth with the NBA Jam arcade machine. This refurbished arcade machine is the real deal – it lets you and up to four friends engage in an all out battle of shoving, turbo dunking, and flaming basketball shooting.

Give your study room a sophisticated feel to it with the bookcase wallpaper. This decorative wallpaper creates the illusion you’re a well-read and sophisticated individual who regularly indulges in the literary arts – and not reality TV marathons of Honey Boo Boo.

Increase your dependence on technology for everyday activities with the motorized solowheel. This innovative new form of transportation allows you to stand on a big motorized wheel that’ll take you anywhere you need to go – like a Segway without all the bulk.

Convert the mundane task of killing mosquitoes into an action packed activity of epic proportions with comic book style fly swatters. Rather than a plain square, these fly swatters come designed with a comic book action phrase swatter that makes killing flies fun.

It’s all smiles and good times when you go to check the time on your LEGO watch. This eye-catching timepiece comes in a bright “LEGO yellow” color and features a vibrant and welcoming LEGO man on the face of the watch who is more than eager to tell you the time!

Flaunt your perceived wealth with the hundred dollar bill toilet paper. Now as you do your business and daydream about having fabulous wealth, you can keep the fantasy alive with this roll of realistic looking roll of Benjamins. Wipe on playa, wipe on.

The drinking straw eyeglasses gives kids and young at heart adults a fun way to drink their beverage. The novelty glasses accommodate to fit various sizes and feature a transparent frame that allows you to see the liquid as it makes its journey to your parched mouth.

Witness the strange beauty of dogs outside of their natural habitat with the underwater dogs photography book. This entertaining book offers readers the chance to laugh and smile as they see page after page of hilarious dogs swimming and frolicking underwater.

Keep the hostile bad guys from spawning in your blocky abode by producing level 14 light with the Minecraft torch. The torch is both decorative and functional as its an officially licensed Minecraft product that can be mounted on the wall and/or serve as a light source.

Bulk up while you get rip roaring drunk using the forearm workout mug. Aside from holding 20 oz. of delicious beer, the mug features a spring loaded hand exerciser so you can unleash the magical strength building powers of alcohol to build muscles fast!

Turn hula hooping into an eye catching nocturnal activity with the light up hula hoop. Whether you decide to use it for exercise or a hypnotic raving accessory, you can count on the visual effects to produce at least one violent seizure in the crowd.

Let Tony Stark be your guiding light through the darkness with the Iron Man flashlight. Much like the actual Iron Man suit, the flashlight comes chock full of special features such as a motion activated setting to patrol your room as well as a voice recorder.

Brush up on the fundamentals with the periodic table of elements shower curtain. This geeky and educational shower curtain displays the entire periodic table of elements in full color so you can study for the big test as you get ready in the morning.

The lasers stars projector makes it possible to gaze at the wonder of the cosmos whenever you wish. The projector places the stars at your fingertips by displaying the constellations onto whatever surface you desire – and can adjust to fit the size of the any surface.

What’s the most intelligent way for psych majors to stay warm and comfy? With the Freudian slippers of course. These plush and cozy slippers come shaped like a cartoon version of one of the most renowned physiologists in the field.

Take your car from a certified hoopty to a Fast and Furious extra with the car interior lighting system. With up to 7 eye-popping colors to choose from – in addition to various lighting effects – the possibilities for eye catching impromptu parties in your car are endless.

Kick back and let your cares and concerns melt away while the back massage robot does its thing. This small palm-size gadget gently lulls you into a state of total relaxation by walking all over your back while massaging you with up to three different settings.

Complete your Starfleet costume while simultaneously adding to your vast collection of geeky memorabilia  with the Star Trek communicator badge. The badge is crafted with extreme detail in order to perfectly replicate the ones used on the show.

Gross out fellow coworkers by posting your memos using the insect push pins. These creepy crawly push pins are designed like various life like insects that’ll make the office bulletin board appear as if it’s become infested by bugs.

Don’t even dream of sharing a milkshake with your sweetheart until you can sip on your romantic malt with some heart straws. Their heart shape is not only more appealing than regular straws, but they also make great accessories for romantically themed events.

Sharpen your espionage skills by capturing unsuspecting people with the high definition camera pen. This high tech pen features a discrete design that comes with a built in microscopic camera – allowing you to capture some amazing high definition footage.

Take some of the sting out of getting a shot with the buzzing pain blocker. This ingenious device – invented by a physician and pain researcher – uses a specialized and pain free method to confuse the nerves and trick the brain into not feeling sharp pain.

Sitting all day long is a silent killer. The stand and sit workstation helps get your blood circulating throughout the day as you can both stand up or sit while working. The computer and keyboard are attached to a one touch motion structure that raises and lowers the PC.

Infiltrate a castle and keep your deadly weapon undetected with this dark assassin dagger with sheath, Styled like a fine medieval dagger, this beautifully crafted weapon features a 5-1/2″ stainless steel blade complete with custom sheath.

Laugh at the misfortune of flunked students as you flip through the pages of the Failed Exams Answers book. This book is a compilation – arranged by subject – of the most clever and incorrect answers ever imaginable. It’s a true indictment of the education system.

Show your kids that it’s fun to conquer mother nature with the amphibious remote control car. Unlike your standard remote control car, this amphibious model comes specially designed to be able to trudge through either pavement, sand, dirt, or water.

Get into the party spirit from the moment you have your first sip with the glow stick party cups. These festive cups come equipped with bright and colorful glow stick rims that make sure that the party stays poppin’ all night long – maybe even into the morning.

Is there anything more metal than resting your mighty axe on the metal hand guitar grip? This heavy duty metal hand is built to handle the weight of any guitar or bass and can be installed in various places so you can rest your instrument like a mighty rock god.

Cook up meat so succulent you’ll convert vegans with it – using the marinade infusing meat tenderizer. Besides tenderizering the meat, it comes with sixty steel pikes that poke tiny holes in the meat so the the flavor seeps into the core when marinating.

Turn your dog into the king of the <del>jungle</del> dog park by taking him out while wearing the lion pet wig. The wig – ideally suited for large breed dogs – will make your docile dog look less like Old Yeller and more like Mufasa. The bitches won’t be able to resist.

Simplify the tedious chore of de-leafing herbs by making it a quick and easy task using the herb stripper. With a single pull of the stem through one of the specially designed holes, the herbs will fall neatly into a small receptacle so you can use them as needed.

Turn your next barbecue into a full on bacon grilling factory with help from this specialized BBQ rack. The bacon grilling rack’s angular design shortens cooking time while cutting down on grease, and making them crispier. It’s a no brainer for bacon lovers.

Keep your home’s charming wooden floors looking springtime clean all year round with the hardwood cleaning robot. This compact robot roves about your home using specialized cloths designed to leave the floors squeaky clean without scratching the wood.

It’s always 4:20 when you walk around with the herb grinder watch. The fictitious watch face reveals a quality metallic grinder anodized for smooth and finished dimensions, allowing you to grind up the most powerful of herbs with unbelievable ease.
